title: Jail Bait
creator_credit: Charles Lamont and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
brief_description: A comedy film starring Buster Keaton. Keaton plays the role of a character who gets caught up in a twisted plot to catch a murderer. Keaton agrees to participate in the plot after being promised a share of the reward money.
